pages.title: Mekanism Basics
pages.text: Mekanism adds some new ores and a lot of other things. Let's talk a bit of mekanism. $(br)Let's start whith the basics. $(br)The new ores can be found as normal minecraft ores. You can use them to make some machines and generators.

pages.title: Mekanism Basics 2
pages.text: Generators can be considered machines too but, i'll keep this as machines and generators to keep this simple. $(br)You can generate energy based on wind or sun while you do some other things. You may need a 'battery' to store yout energy.

pages.title: Mekanism Basics 3
pages.text: You can store your energy on energy cubes to charge some tools and for later use. $(br2)You can make some cables to transport energy, item, fluids and gases. You can make some machines to make the best energy generation of Mekanism.

pages.title: Mekanism Basics 4
pages.text: Mekanism adds some alloys and control circuits that you will need to make generators, machines and upgrades for machines. I'll show you some basic mekanism recipes.

pages.title: Mekanism Basics 5
pages.text: This are the basics of mekanism. You can learn more of mekanism in this book and with some more research on internet or on FB Mods Wiki
